39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.changes: Smeeta Kavat’s Charm Critical Chance and Energy recharge Buffs no longer apply to Operators.

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.fixes: Fixed the Hunter Command Mod not allowing pets to use other scripted abilities they have equipped (such as Smeeta Charm).

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.fixes: Fixes towards Smeeta Charm buffs not consistently applying to the Operator.

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.changes: Operators are now affected by the Smeeta Kavat Mischief/Charm buffs.

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.1
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.fixes: Fixed Smeeta’s Charm precept buff giving Bows an unintended insane Fire Rate.

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.fixes: Fixed Smeeta's Charm ‘Doubled Pickups and Affinity’ buff not working as intended and doubling a number of things that were unintended. It now properly doubles pickups: Resource, Health, Energy, Affinity, Credit and Ammo (previously it would).

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: The Silver Grove: U1.2 + U1.3
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.changes: Changed Smeeta's Charm ability, specifically the Resource related Charm, to give a single Resource pickup rather than a random stack of resources that may not be the appropriate size for the chosen Resource type.

39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.name: The Silver Grove
39a8da6547c4c558df9018d16400bfdf.fixes: Fixed an exploit with Smeeta's Charm ability.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Fortuna: Update 24.0
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes: Enjoy the efforts of all of us at Digital Extremes, delivered here in Fortuna. Your patience, support, excitement, and feedback has made this update possible. We dedicate it to you.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes: Made some micro-optimizations to the Sahasa Kubrow Dig Precept.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes:
Who would have thought that we’d be launching our third cinematic quest. With the ambitious goal of telling Warframe’s story in a way we had never done before, The Second Dream started it all. The moments you shared with us while playing through the quest is a memory all of us at Digital Extremes will never forget. So we thought… wow, we did it… Can we do it again? And so it was, we burned heaps of midnight oil to launch The War Within and experience the roller coaster of feels with you all over again.
From all of us at Digital Extremes, thank you for sharing Warframe with us. This once small but growing studio in London, Ontario couldn’t have done any of this without your extraordinary support, Tenno.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes: Endless Excavation missions now display ‘Digs Completed’ instead of ‘Total Cryotic Excavated’. The number of ‘Digs Completed’ is what counts towards the tiered Rewards in the Endless modes, and this change saves you some mental math!

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Update 19.13.0
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.fixes: A collection of glyphs, using captured frames from the 100 Days of Warframe video by Digital Extremes & MASHED.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.fixes: Fixed Kubrow ‘Howl’ and ‘Dig’ barks not playing.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Update 19: The War Within
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes: We are beyond lucky to have hard working people at Digital Extremes to bring this chapter of Warframe to life. We are grateful to have you to share it with.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Update 18.4.0
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes:
Dig Site drop points have been optimized to enable players to constantly run into Dig Sites, instead of hunting for a new Site between each completed dig.
Areas with multiple Dig Sites will be more difficult to defend, should players decide to activate more than one Site at a time.
Dig Sites must be activated in order of being discovered.
Dig Sites will no longer immediately reappear in a location that was just recently excavated.
Power Cell carrying enemies should be more readily available before the first Dig Site is active.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.changes: Dig sites will appear in an order that gives players a reasonable tour through the map starting at the closest dig site.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Update 14.1.0: Quanta & Dendra
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.fixes: The Kubrow ‘Dig’ ability has been altered so as to allow for both Health and Energy orbs to drop from a single usage of the ability, however this will only occur when the criteria for this event are met, i.e the owners health, energy, or ammo levels are low. Other loot will not be restricted by these criteria. In addition, any success chance over 100% will cause a second roll items, including Health/Energy orbs, to occur. Additionally, we’ve received clarification on the ‘Dig’ ability is as follows. The Dig ability generates items based on your needs at the time, and the amount of needed items increases as the mod is ranked. Which is to say, if you are low on health, the Dig ability will favour generating a Health orb at the time.

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Hotfix 13.9.0.2
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.fixes: Our digital certificate has been renewed and players may notice the name change from “Digital Extremes” to “Digital Extremes Ltd.”

56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.name: Update 5.4 - "Hammer Time" (Preview)
56fe14b478c86316e04b7070a8f9d326.fixes: 937 Russian updates from Crond, Digimortal, Dyshes, FedorHooch, Grayscarr, SaSslx86, Moloxix and YTUX.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.3 + 24.1.3.1
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fix to Howl and Nekros’ Terrify sometimes not making the target run away in the Plains or Vallis.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.9
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed Kavat Roar & Kubrow Howl Precepts not creating FX on Clients unless they were the second Precept equipped.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.5.0
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.changes: Fixed Excalibur Umbra’s Radial Howl not working as intended. Radial Howl now removes the opponents jump and deals damage.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.3 - Limbo Prime
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.changes: Tweaked Umbra’s Radial Howl animation to have a very similar cast time and FX to Excalibur’s Radial Blind.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.changes: Changed the Howl of the Kubrow quest phase description from "Wait for your Kubrow to mature" to "Incubate and mature a Kubrow using the Incubator" as Maturing is now done manually by players.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.2
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping issue in the Howl of the Kubrow quest if you died and revived in the mission.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed Kubrow ‘Howl’ and ‘Dig’ barks not playing.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Update 19: The War Within
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed an issue with Howl of the Kubrow quest being prematurely completable.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Mercury Junction: Once Awake, Howl of the Kubrow

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Update 18.3
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.changes: Kubrow Egg drop rate increased significantly when playing the Howl of the Kubrow Quest during the Egg hunting Mission.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed the Kubrow’s collar not being hidden during the last Mission in the Howl of the Kubrow Quest.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed the Raksa Kubrow’s Howl sometimes not playing.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed the Kubrow Howl ability affecting targets that should be immune due to existing effects like Chaos or Disarm.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Update 14.6.0
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Tweaked the sound of the Raska Howl ability.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.changes:
Tweaked the range of 'Howl' to prevent enemies behind walls getting affected.
Fixed typo in the ‘Howl’ Kubrow mod.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Hotfix 14.0.8
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Kubrow Quest ‘Howl of the Kubrow’ being incompletable.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Hotfix 14.0.7 + 14.0.7.1
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: The Kubrow Hunt and Howl abilities will no longer trigger when enemies are not alerted.

69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.name: Hotfix 14.0.2
69696e8c270c0f87723314b64998186e.fixes: Fixed false 'you got an Egg!' lines in the Howl of the Kubrow quest when you had not received an egg.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.5.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes:
Nidus Night Hunter Skin by Mz-3
Fixed a script error when accessing Konzu’s Bounty board after completing an Eidolon Hunt.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.7 + 24.2.7.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Made some micro-optimizations to the Hunter Command Beast Precept Mod.
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed the Hunter Command Beast Precept Mod generating 100 Kavat Affinity every 6 seconds (this could also trigger a UI-issue where it would appear to generate increasing amounts of Affinity).

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Removed random Ayatan Sculptures from Orb Vallis Cache Hunts rewards.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Chimera: Update 23.10
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed the Treasure Hunter challenge not working for Clients.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Made some micro-optimizations to the Helminth Charger Trample and Huras Hunt Precepts.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixes towards Eidolon Hunt Bounties insta-failing after transitioning to the Plains from Cetus.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Fixed Teralyst fight session not locking after the first Synovia has been destroyed when not in the Teralyst Hunt Bounty.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.12.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes:
Eidolon Hunters eager to prove their worth are trying to summon these creatures again. Are you worthy, Tenno?
You now have options to matchmake for Eidolon Hunts!

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.2
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed the Hunter Command Mod not allowing pets to use other scripted abilities they have equipped (such as Smeeta Charm).

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Hunter Command Mod change: your Companion will now focus on an enemy for a set duration when they are first slash proc’d by you. While focused on a target, they will ignore any other newly proc’d enemies and will go back to their default behavior after the duration expires.
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed Exodia Hunt affecting allies.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.3.5
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes:
Fixed the Hunter Mod sets not being linkable in Chat or in the Codex.
Fixed the Hunter Synergy Mod’s +30 Crit-Link stat not displaying anywhere on the Arsenal UI.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.3.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed the Hunter Command Mod having an unrelated Fusion Core (wow, remember those things??) description.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.additions: Tenno who seek out the Eidolon Hunter will be exposed to an Operator Weaponry system.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.5.2
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed a script error in Maroo’s Ayatan Hunt mission.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Maroo will patiently wait for the Stolen Dreams quest to be completed before she starts offering you weekly Ayatan Hunt missions.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.8
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed Maroo telling you she had an Ayatan Hunt mission for you but survey said that was a lie.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed the Helminth Hunt precept Mod having redundant description text.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 19: The War Within
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed a crash that could occur when being attacked by Zanuka after using a Zanuka Hunter Beacon.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Hunt down a heavily defended Grineer Ship and destroy it by fighting through the ship’s defenses, such as: energy shields, turrets, and mines.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 18.9.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: •    Fixed the Huntress Bundle missing its diorama in the Market.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 18.8.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: •    Fixed the Huntsman Soma Skin not applying properly to the Soma Prime.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Hunt down this new mechanical threat, Tenno!

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 15.2.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.changes: Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod will now prompt Kubrow to pick an enemy near other enemies (since the charge is AoE).
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes:
Fixed issue with Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod where charge would end after 5 frames of no movement.
Fixed issue with Huras Kubrow Hunt Mod where all Kubrow in mission would share the same cooldown recharge time.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Hotfix 14.0.8
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Kubrow Mod ‘Hunt’ now scales with damage Mods, but has had it's base damage reduced to compensate.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Hotfix 14.0.7 + 14.0.7.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: The Kubrow Hunt and Howl abilities will no longer trigger when enemies are not alerted.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Hotfix 11.1.1
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: A script has recently run to give all Founders of Hunter of above the Excalibur Prime Avatar in-game.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 11.1.0
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: New Weapon: CERNOS Tenno Hunting bow

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Hotfix 11.0.6
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: Fixed Hunt for Alad V breach “Muffled Sounds” being applied to all players when one player enters breach.

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 11: Valkyr Unleashed
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.additions: Update 11 Launch Event: The Hunt for Alad V! https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/132827-the-hunt-for-alad-v-is-on/

eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.name: Update 7 - "stormbringer"
eae7df4f2af48a02faed4345fbbbdc8f.fixes: a Tenno Hunting Bow that launches arrows with a chargeable magnetic field.

da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.fixes: Fixed Kavats equipped with Mischief appearing headless after a Host migration occured.

da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.1.0 + 21.1.0.1
da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.changes: Improved the Smeeta Kavat Mischief buff for Operators. Relevant buffs on the Warframes will always be transferred to the Operator and vice versa.

da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.9
da12085a855f6270c3fc8608f8dc589f.changes: Operators are now affected by the Smeeta Kavat Mischief/Charm buffs.

2dd3034b57c27b5f3876b569e37aa89b.name: The Silver Grove
2dd3034b57c27b5f3876b569e37aa89b.changes: Kavats no longer use their Pounce ability when trying to be stealthy and have the Pounce mod equipped.

2dd3034b57c27b5f3876b569e37aa89b.name: Specters of the Rail: Update 1
2dd3034b57c27b5f3876b569e37aa89b.fixes: Fixed enemies appearing to run in place like they are slipping on ice after your Kavat has used Pounced.

a6bfc84028881bff17d7c08313cc8528.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
a6bfc84028881bff17d7c08313cc8528.changes: Made some micro-optimizations to the Helminth Charger Proboscis Precept.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Mask of the Revenant: Update 23.8.0 + 23.8.0.1 + 23.8.0.2
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: Fixed a progression stopper in the Sands of Inaros quest as a result of the first phase of the boss fight being skipped and Inaros becoming invulnerable. Also fixed the Tomb Protector in Sands of Inaros attacking while invisible and having floating weapons instead of being entombed while you fight the Golems.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: The Sacrifice: Hotfix 23.0.8
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: Fixed Vazarin Protective Dash healing being removed when using Umbra and Transferring back to your Warframe.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: Fixed Stalker sometimes not spawning in the “Protect the Moon” mission of the Second Dream.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.7
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: Fixed minor performance issue and crashing during the ‘Protect the Moon’ phase of The Second Dream.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.6.0 + Hotfix 22.6.0.1
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.changes: Protective Dash now grants 5s of immunity at max, up from 2s.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.3
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: Fixed Vazarin’s Protective Dash providing immunity and health, regardless of whether or not anything is hit. Only "allies hit by Void Dash" are meant to receive buff.

2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.name: Update 18.10.0: Operation Rathuum!
2314d07f8cb2dd848f2b08d2732969b6.fixes: ·         Fixed the Tomb Protector Codex entry showing a quiver penetrating his chest as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/620855-bow-and-arrow-bug-with-inaros/

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.changes: Reflect – Reflects damage back at attackers with increased lethality.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Reflection Probes have been built through many areas of the game, grounding PBR materials with more accurate lighting.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 18.3
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.changes: The Mortal Conduct Conclave Mod has been changed to: At Low Health, +60% Channeled Damage Reflection for 8 seconds.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Hotfix 17.1.5
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Fixed the text on the Reflection Mod to read Channelling instead of Blocking as per new Stamina changes.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 16.8.0
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Mesa: Staggering Shield: Reflected bullets have a 50% chance to stumble enemies.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Disabled Local Reflections and High Dynamic Range on certain Direct X9 enabled video cards which do not properly support these features.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Hotfix 14.6.1
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.changes: Tweaked performance of Local Reflections code on Dx10 and Dx11 to address potential FPS loss.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.changes: Reduced the amount of damage dealt to attacking players when using Reflection in PvP matches.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 10.6.0: The Vectis!
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Fixed game crash when Reflection Mod parries an Infested suicide runner.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Fixed Reflection mod not working on Grineer Lancers.

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 6.3 - "make Love, Not War(Frame)"
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Local Reflections settings now properly save

bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.name: Update 6: Hotfixes
bc42e46a98572ff13189d2dbd6f7b8bf.fixes: Fixed Brightness, Contrast, Local Reflections and Tutorials Enabled not taking effect

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.changes: The Chesa Kubrow Retrieve Precept has been changed to reflect the following mechanic:

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.4.0
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.changes: Optimized the Chesa Retrieve Precept to reduce significant frame-rate micro-stutters.

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.5.0 + 22.5.0.1
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.changes: Improvements towards the Chesa Kubrow Retrieve functionality when retrieving items in nearby crates and when in the Plains.

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.fixes: Improved the interaction between the Chesa Kubrow’s Scavenge and Retrieve Abilities, reducing the amount of downtime between the Kubrow smashing crates and picking up items.

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.changes: The Chesa Kubrow’s Retrieve ability will now grab multiple items at once.

540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.name: Hotfix 14.0.5
540280c9108e537c57e927690be6b9a4.fixes: Fixed end-of-mission loading screen hang caused by acquiring certain consumables in missions, notably the `Retrieve Foundry Segement`of Vor`s Prize.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Hotfix 20.4.5
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.fixes: Fixed an issue with Scavenger Ospreys summoned by Nekros/manipulated by Nyx/other abilities consuming loot (they ignore it now when ‘under the influence’).

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: The Silver Grove: U4+4.1
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.changes: Carrier’s Vacuum and Corpus Scavenger Drones will no longer be able to pick up or affect the placement of Ayatan Stars. This was causing Stars to become unreachable or falling through the floor.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Hotfix 18.6.3
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.fixes: Improved the interaction between the Chesa Kubrow’s Scavenge and Retrieve Abilities, reducing the amount of downtime between the Kubrow smashing crates and picking up items.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.fixes: Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys and Mutalist Osprey Carriers can now be spawned in the Simulacrum.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Update 18.4.0
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.changes: Enabled Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys, and Mutalist Osprey Carriers in the Simulacrum.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.changes: Fixed 'Scavenge' causing permanent freezing when multiple Kubrow's tried to interact with the same locker. If there are multiple Kubrows in a mission, no more than one can target the same locker.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Hotfix 14.0.7 + 14.0.7.1
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.fixes: Reduced the delays on Kubrow's Scavenge ability.

99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.name: Hotfix 13.6.1
99c351b5a0e28cbf94536a62664bc8cb.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Shotgun Scavenger mod providing ammo bonuses for non-shell type ammunitions.

bece87b82d8ac873c5fcb497427af2b0.name: The Silver Grove
bece87b82d8ac873c5fcb497427af2b0.fixes: Fixed the Sense Danger Kavat Mod always displaying bright pink enemies.

8caa59e68e4564aee213e2710f27866f.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
8caa59e68e4564aee213e2710f27866f.changes: The Sharpened Claws Kavat Mod now only applies the Armour debuff when actually dealing damage. Previously the Armour debuff would activate even if no damage was dealt.

8caa59e68e4564aee213e2710f27866f.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.2
8caa59e68e4564aee213e2710f27866f.fixes: Fixed the Sharpened Claws Kavat Mod giving Armor removed by 4 Corrosive Projections back to enemies. Bad kitty!

f1e198d78d62256fe321b4d07a014d65.name: Update 16.4
f1e198d78d62256fe321b4d07a014d65.fixes: Shelter: Provides a shield when the owner is reviving an ally.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.5.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Stalker spawning inside the floor during the Second Dream quest.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Buried Debts: Update 24.4.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Smoking Body Ephemera (obtained from Stalker)

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.2.8
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes:
Stalker’s Smoke Screen ability now has a 20 second cooldown.
Fixed players panicking and fleeing the mission causing Stalker to get stuck and preventing mission progress.
Fixed Stalker not being fully invulnerable during his spawn/getup sequence.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Fortuna: The Profit-Taker - Update 24.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: A new Baruuk UI Theme and Stalker UI Theme are now purchasable under Options > Interface > UI Customization.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.3 + 24.1.3.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Fixed Seeking Talons not being cancelled by Stalker.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue with lockdown alarm lights not shutting off after the Stalker leaves.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Chimera: Update 23.10
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker and Zanuka unable to target players after being Enthralled by Revenant or Chaos'd by Nyx, even after Ability expires.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: The Sacrifice: Prime Vault Hotfix 23.1.2!
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue where the Stalker could get stuck in walls in certain levels.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker sometimes not spawning in the “Protect the Moon” mission of the Second Dream.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Naramon’s Void Stalker Critical Chance buff being applied to non-Melee weapons.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.16.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker Noggle
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Nyx’s Mind Control affecting the Stalker and causing him to walk around like he lost something.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker going too far with the whole "I'm a badass trolling jerk" routine by initiating permanent lockdown in Void/Derelict/Lua missions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Disabled Stalker, Arc traps, and random transmissions during some quest missions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Stalker spawning at the very end of a Void Fissure Defense mission while you’re invulnerable.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker Death Marks

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.8 + 21.0.8.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: The Stalker can no longer apply Nyx's passive to disarm enemies hit with Absorb due to being so powerful it crashed your game. Stalker pls.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.4
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker ‘whooshing’ and other sounds being too loud. Fear the whoosh!

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Zanuka having a chance of dropping both the Detron Blueprint and a Detron part (unlike any other Stalker-type enemy).

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: The Silver Grove: Hotfix 2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Dynamic music not switching when the Stalker appears.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Specters of the Rail: U2.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Updated the Burston mesh in the Stalker diorama.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.12.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: •    Made optimizations to reduce stuttering when a Tenno or Stalker joins your mission in progress.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes:
The Stalker will no longer appear to attack players wearing a Warframe under Rank 10.
The Stalker’s blueprint drop chance has been increased to 50%.
Fixed hacking terminals becoming unhackable if the Stalker teleports a player mid-using the terminal.
Fixed the Stalker’s Acolytes looking like Excalibur in the Codex.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.4.11
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: A message will now be shown to indicate when a G3/Zanuka/Stalker 'bait/mark' can not be used in a mission.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue where the Shadow Stalker was not being spawned for eligible players who were using Stalker Bait.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.4.6
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes:
Fixed Defense Missions not spawning enemies after a Host Migration after the Stalker has appeared.
Added a ‘Stalker’ category to Codex enemies.
Reduced the amount of Stalker VO taunts that could play during a Mission down to 3.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes:
Alad V has returned, hunted by the Acolytes of Stalker for his crime of aiding the Lotus.  True to their word the Tenno will repay their debt to their unsteady ally, tracking down these assassins across the Solar System before they have a chance to reach their mark.
Raid Corpus and Grineer facilities to find information that will help uncover the Stalker's elusive Acolytes.  Join your fellow Tenno in the hunt and put a stop to the Stalker's plans!

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 18.2.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Void Interception Missions ending while Captain Vor or the Stalker is still alive.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 18.1.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Shadow Stalker will now be granted immunity to physical damage types separately (i.e. Puncture, Slash, Impact).

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.0.7
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Stalker appearing in the Shadow Stalker’s Codex Diorama entry.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.0.5
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Sentient Stalker now drops War and Broken War blueprints.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes:
Fixed the Stalker showing up in the Shadow Stalker’s Codex entry.
Fixed two Shadow Stalkers appearing in the Codex under the Shadow Stalker’s Codex entry.
Fixed color pigments not properly dropping from the Shadow Stalker.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Made slight adjustments to the Stalker and Hunhow’s VO FX in the Second Dream.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: Players can now rewatch the Stalker Intro Cinematic from The Second Dream Quest via the ‘Rewatch’ button available in the Quest’s Codex.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes:
Visual improvements have been made to the Stalker’s armor.
Adjusted the frequency of the Stalker’s whisper VO on his appearance.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes:
Pakal Syandana: Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.
Pakal Stalker Armor:  Formed from the bones of Sentient fighters and given to the Stalker by Hunhow.
Sotz Scimitar Skin: Cast the Stalker’s caustic shadow across the Scimitar with this skin.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: War:  The Stalker’s sword as bestowed on him by the Sentient Hunhow.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 17.7
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Frost’s passive freeze ability working on ability-immune enemies like the Stalker.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 16.10.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue causing the Stalker’s Codex entry to be in English for all regions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Shade Sentinel’s Ghost and the Hura's Stalk Ability not properly functioning.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 16.4.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue where Stalker-like enemies could make the Event mission break.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: ·         Fixed Huras Kubrow’s Stalk not properly applying to Players.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.14.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: The Stalker, Gustrag 3 and Zanuka will no longer be summoned in Syndicate Missions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 15.13
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: Loot waypoints can now be set for Syndicate Medallions, Oberon Blueprints and Stalker weapon Blueprints.  These waypoint markers will be much clearer in what you’re alerting your squadmates of.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 15.11
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker causing missions to enter lock-down and be unbeatable on Key Missions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Mesa Update
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Fixed Stalker music blending in with level music in some instances.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 15.3.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Stalker’s music not looping.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 15.2.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed continued issues with Stalker not spawning properly.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes:
Fixed another instance of lockdown’s not ending correctly after the Stalker leaves.
Fixed an instance of the Stalker getting stuck in waiting to spawn mode on Interception and Defense maps.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker will now activate lockdown when he Spawns.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed doors and hack panels locked by the Stalker not always unlocking after he leaves.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.0.8
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Stalker and other minibosses appearing on quest missions which could break the mission.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.0.7
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: • Improved the performance of the Stalker's initial loading into a level.
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: • Tweaked a number of Stalker sound effects.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.0.6
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Stalker ability cancel ability can close rifts. Prevents people from just using Banish or Tear in Space to avoid being hurt by the Stalker.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 15.0.5
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Rift Walk can now be disabled by the Stalker.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 14.10.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes:
Fixed the Stalker taking shield damage during his intro and outro animation sequence.
Fixed clients being able to damage the Stalker’s health during intro and outro animation sequences if there is a laggy host.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed continued issue where Stalker and other minibosses could appear during the claim reward/continue screen in Defense and Interception missions.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed an issue with Stalker related blueprints not appearing at the end of match screen correctly.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 14.0.6
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: The Stalker can now deactivate Hall of Mirrors.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 13.7.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed issues where Void Vor (or Stalker) can spawn and kill you during Defense selection screen.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 13.0.6+13.0.7+13.0.7.1
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Prevent Stalker and other hunter type enemies from showing up during Defense waves that end in the "Continue?" prompt.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 13: Dark Sectors
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: Katana 1:    Tranquil CleaveSword 1:    Iron PhoenixSword 2:    Crimson DervishDual Sword 1:    Crossing SnakesDual Sword 2:    Swirling TigerScythe 1:    Reaping SpiralScythe 2:    Stalking FanFist 1:    Seismic PalmFist 2:    Fracturing WindHands&Feet 1:    Grim FuryHands&Feet 2:   Brutal TideStaff 1:    Clashing ForestStaff 2:    Flailing BranchGlaive 1:    Gleaming TalonPolearm 1:    Shimmering BlightPolearm 2:    Bleeding WillowWhip 1:    Burning WaspWhip 2:    Coiling ViperDagger 1:    Homing FangDagger 2:    Pointed WindDual Dagger 1:    Gnashing PayaraDual Dagger 2:    Sinking TalonAxe/Heavy Sword 1:    Cleaving WhirlwindAxe/Heavy Sword 2:    Rending CraneHammer 1:    Shattering StormHammer 2:    Crushing RuinMachete 1:    Sundering Weave
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Improved the Stalker and other hunter AI types targeting selection so as to ensure that they do not attack low level players.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 12.4.2
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed Zephyr’s Tornado and Vauban’s Vortex being able to ragdoll harder enemies (Mini-bosses like Stalker, etc). The Tornado will still deal DOT, but it won’t ragdoll. It is now consistent with other ragdoll-esque powers.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 12.3.0: The Grustrag Three
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed music not restarting after Stalker/Harvester appears.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 11.7.3
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.additions: Added clarity and exposure to the Stalker/Harvester Systems in game. Two things to note here:

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 11.3.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker should be smarter about picking travel points to approach the targeted player.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 11.1.3
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Fixed Stalker spawning during defense mission “leave/continue” dialog.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 11: Valkyr Unleashed
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker has been improving his melee combo techniques

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Hotfix 10.7.1: Double Resource Weekend!
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.changes: Stalker has practiced against Frost’s Snowglobe and is no longer affected.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 10.7.0
f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.fixes: Fixed the Stalker's melee combo sometimes getting stuck in a restarting loop on client

Fixed sentinel's ghost ability not being cancelled by the Stalker.
Improvements and potentially fixed bug where Stalker would become unresponsive.

f582abab481ebbbd69374a6ece1653c5.name: Update 7.8.0
